question: I am a diabetes educator, I just recently received a huge amount of 508 pump supplies from a patient who upgraded her pump.  I am offering these for free; however, I cannot pay for the price of shipping, local pickup please.If interested, I have reservoirs, infusion sets, the whole nine yards, please contact meShannon at 586-294-0014, located in Warren, Michigan.Thanks
title: Insulin Pump Supplies
